SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication

Interface ServerCommunication

All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServerApp, TCPServer
public interface ServerCommunication
Interface of the notification methods of the servers

    • gameSetUp

      void gameSetUp()
      Send one GameSetUp object to every player

    • notifyDisconnection

      void notifyDisconnection(String playerName)
      If in game, function notifies the disconnection of a player to all the others
      Parameters:
      playerName - player that disconnect

    • notifyReconnection

      void notifyReconnection(String playerName)
      Notify to all clients that a player reconnected
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the player who reconnected

    • notifyMessage

      void notifyMessage(String sender, String date, String message)
      Send a message to all players
      Parameters:
      sender - sender's name
      date - date of message creation
      message - actual message to be sent

    • notifyMessage

      void notifyMessage(String sender, String date, String message, String receiver)
      Send a message to all players
      Parameters:
      sender - sender's name
      date - date of message creation
      message - actual message to be sent
      receiver - receiver's name

      playerName - player's name
